title: 怎么在一个命令方块里设置几种指令啊？
author: 翔哉，回也
txt_content:
如题
比如：在一个命令方块里输入给武器附加属性和无法破坏的指令
谢谢

replies.author: Male__旧爱
翔哉，回也
replies.txt_content:
时间是生命啊
QAQTAT

replies.author: Male__旧爱
replies.txt_content: 命令方块的这种命令一般都是用软件生成的，像比较好用的MCH什么的，如果你不会的话，我可以帮你弄.

replies.author: 翔哉，回也
replies.txt_content:
Male__旧爱 发表于 2015-12-12 18:47
命令方块的这种命令一般都是用软件生成的，像比较好用的MCH什么的，如果你不会的话，我可以帮你弄. ...
就是/give @p minecraft:diamond_sword 1 0 
{AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:9000000000.0,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack}]}的效果加上/give @p diamond 1 0 
{Unbreakable:1b,}的效果

replies.author: Male__旧爱
replies.txt_content:
翔哉，回也 发表于 2015-12-12 18:53
就是/give @p minecraft:diamond_sword 1 0 
{AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1 ...
就是给最近的一个人带什么属性和说明的钻石对吧？

replies.author: 翔哉，回也
replies.txt_content:
Male__旧爱 发表于 2015-12-12 18:54
就是给最近的一个人带什么属性和说明的钻石对吧？
不是，是加属性和让他无法破坏

replies.author: 翔哉，回也
replies.txt_content:
Male__旧爱 发表于 2015-12-12 18:59
...稍等，帮你弄
谢谢，QAQ

replies.author: Male__旧爱
replies.txt_content: /setblock ~ ~1 ~ standing_sign 0 replace {Text1:"{text:\"请点击我\",clickEvent:{action:\"run_command\",value:\"/blockdata ~ ~-1 ~ {Command:/give @p minecraft:diamond 1 0 {display:{Name:\u00A71超级钻石,Lore:[0:\u00A79嗯，超级钻石,]},AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:332270761,UUIDMost:332270761,Amount:100,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:459813703,UUIDMost:459813703,Amount:100,AttributeName:generic.followRange,Name:Range},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:909064533,UUIDMost:909064533,Amount:100,AttributeName:generic.maxHealth,Name:Health},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:227279876,UUIDMost:227279876,Amount:100,AttributeName:generic.knockbackResistance,Name:Knockback},{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1593492800,UUIDMost:1593492800,Amount:100,AttributeName:generic.movementSpeed,Name:Speed}],Unbreakable:1},}\"}}"}

replies.author: Male__旧爱
replies.txt_content:
翔哉，回也 发表于 2015-12-12 18:55
不是，是加属性和让他无法破坏
这个是加了颜色，改了名字和加了血量、怪物跟踪、攻击力、防击退和速度这些属性= =还有不可破坏

replies.txt_content:
Male__旧爱 发表于 2015-12-12 19:10
/give @p minecraft:diamond 1 0 {ench:[{id:0,lvl:50},{id:1,lvl:50},{id:2,lvl:50},{id:3,lvl:50},{id:4, ...

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
翔哉，回也 发表于 2015-12-12 18:53
就是/give @p minecraft:diamond_sword 1 0 
{AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1 ...
其实很简单的：
/give @p minecraft:diamond_sword 1 0 {Unbreakable:1b,AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:9000000000.0,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack}]}

格式为{NBT1,NBT2,NBT3,……}
多种NBT/效果用英文逗号隔开即可
